spacr.spacr_cellpose

Module Contents

spacr.spacr_cellpose.parse_cellpose4_output(output)[source]

General parser for Cellpose eval output. Handles: - batched format (list of 4 arrays) - per-image list of flows :returns: masks, flows0, flows1, flows2, flows3
